releases.name: v1.7.7 - Critical Gold Member Access Fix & UI Improvements
releases.body:
## üîß Critical Bug Fix Release

This release fixes a critical issue where **gold members and other authorized users were incorrectly denied access** to the uploader, despite having sufficient permissions.

### üêõ Critical Bug Fixed
- **Gold Member Access Issue**: Fixed rank validation logic that was incorrectly denying access to gold members and other authorized users
- **Root Cause**: System was only checking the `UserRanks` array, but when empty, it should fall back to the primary `UserRank` field
- **Impact**: Users with valid ranks (gold member, platinum member, etc.) can now upload normally

### üéØ UI Improvements
- **Close Button**: Added close button (√ó) to rank restriction warning dialog
- **Contact Links**: Added direct clickable links to [OpenSubtitles Contact](https://opensubtitles.org/contact) for support requests
- **Better UX**: Users can now easily dismiss permission warnings and contact support directly

### üîß Technical Details
- Enhanced rank validation with `effectiveRanks` fallback logic
- When `UserRanks` array is empty, system now uses `[UserRank]` as fallback
- Maintains backward compatibility with existing rank validation systems
- Added proper error handling and logging for rank validation

### ‚úÖ Tested & Verified
- Gold members now get `canUpload: true` (previously false)
- Bronze members still correctly denied access  
- Users with populated `UserRanks` arrays continue working normally
- All existing functionality preserved

This is a **critical fix** - users who were previously locked out due to the rank validation bug can now access the uploader normally.

---

releases.name: v1.7.1 - Fixed GitHub Actions Workflow
releases.body:
## Version 1.7.1 - Fixed GitHub Actions Workflow

This release removes duplicate builds by making the workflow manual-only.

### Key Changes:
- üîß Removed automatic triggers from build workflow 
- üìù Updated documentation with correct workflow commands
- üéØ Manual-only workflow prevents duplicate CI builds
- ‚úÖ No more automatic builds on push/tag

### Downloads:
- **macOS**: `OpenSubtitles.Uploader.PRO_1.7.1_universal.dmg` (Universal Binary)
- **Windows**: `OpenSubtitles.Uploader.PRO_1.7.1_x64-setup.exe` (64-bit)
- **Linux**: `OpenSubtitles.Uploader.PRO_1.7.1_amd64.AppImage` (64-bit)

### Auto-updater manifest:
- `latest.json` - For automatic updates

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>

releases.name: v1.6.14 - Clean Build Without Warnings
releases.body:
# üîß Version 1.6.14 - Clean Build Without Warnings

## üêõ Bug Fixes
- **Rust Compiler Warnings**: Fixed unused variable and assignment warnings
- **Clean Build**: Eliminated all compiler warnings for production build
- **Code Quality**: Improved Rust code following best practices

## üõ†Ô∏è Code Improvements
- **actual_file_path**: Changed to immutable variable with proper if-let assignment
- **_file_name parameter**: Added underscore prefix for intentionally unused parameter
- **Version Script**: Used proper npm run update-version script instead of manual editing

## üìñ Documentation
- **CLAUDE.md**: Added critical instructions for version script usage
- **Version Management**: Updated guidelines to always use npm run update-version

## üéØ Technical Details
- **Warning-free Build**: No more Rust compiler warnings in production builds
- **Better Flow Control**: Improved variable assignment patterns
- **Consistent Versioning**: All version files updated via automated script

## üöÄ Streaming Progress Bar Features (from v1.6.13)
- **Real-time Progress Bar**: Complete streaming HTTP download progress that works in UI
- **Native Progress Events**: Tauri event system for seamless progress communication
- **Clean Milestone Logging**: Shows progress only at key milestones (20%, 40%, 60%, 80%, 100%)

This release ensures clean, warning-free builds while maintaining all streaming progress bar functionality. Perfect for development and production environments requiring strict code quality standards.

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>

releases.name: OpenSubtitles Uploader PRO v1.1.2-build179
releases.body:
## [1.7.1] - 2025-08-11
### Fixed
- üöÄ RELEASE: Version 1.7.1 - Fixed GitHub Actions Workflow

## OpenSubtitles Uploader PRO Desktop Apps

Native desktop applications for Windows, macOS, and Linux.

### Download the appropriate version for your platform:

**Windows:**
- `OpenSubtitles Uploader PRO_x.x.x_x64-setup.exe` - Windows installer

**macOS:**
- `OpenSubtitles Uploader PRO_macos.tar.gz` - Universal (Intel & Apple Silicon)

**Linux:**
- `opensubtitles-uploader-pro_x.x.x_amd64.AppImage` - Universal Linux binary

### Installation Instructions:

**Windows:** Download and run the `.exe` setup file
**macOS:** Download the `.tar.gz` file, extract it, and run the app
**Linux:** Download the `.AppImage`, make it executable (`chmod +x *.AppImage`), then run

### Features:
- Native file system access
- Drag & drop support
- All web app features
- System notifications
- Offline capability

Built with Tauri framework for native performance and security.
